title: Divinity.Original.Sin.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Divinity.Original.Sin.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Year: 2014
Genre: RPG / 3D / Isometric
Developer: Larian Studios
Publisher: Larian Studios
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
VoiceLanguage: Eng |Rus
Crack: 3DMGAME





System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6600 or equivalent
Memory: 2 GB
Video Card: NVIDIA Geforce 8800GTS / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or better DirectX 9.0c compatible
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectXÃ‚Â® 9.0
Free space on hard disk: 10.5 GB

Game information:

In the story of Divinity: Original Sin us falls the role
of some "Hunters source" - a little-known warriors guild,
which had already been dubbed "magic police."
In this largely storyline Divinity: Original Sin event precedes
the very first part of the Divinity, which marked the beginning
of the world-famous fantasy series. We are waiting for the
familiar characters, but radically different approach to the
story campaign.

From the outset, the passage of Divinity: Original Sin tell us
that the world faces an invasion of orcs rivellona Tanarota who
managed to master the powerful magic that distort reality. Now
free peoples in Divinity simply impossible to resist the fury
of the orcs, and only two people are able to prevent future wars.
So, the main characters Divinity: Original Sin became at once
two characters: damn warrior, who was released from custody,
and a mysterious girl, who managed to conquer death. However,
throughout the game in Divinity saved pleasant affair: Heroes
combines some terrible secret which will only be able to find you.

Another key feature of Divinity: Original Sin was that the game
implements a classless system, which will be the basis of a number
of diverse abilities to develop skills of the protagonists. However,
in order to resist the stronger enemies in Divinity: Original Sin
implemented to collect detachments of troops, which can be assigned
to commanders, as well as steps to improve the combat system of the army.

The game world in the new part of Divinity surprise you its realism
and openness: you will travel through the vast Rivellon, facing face
to face with a variety of unknown creatures, showing extreme caution.
Each offense in the world Divinity can cost you your life!


Game Features:

The two main characters
The lack of classes in the system of character development
Set of capabilities and a wide arsenal of weapons

Ability to recruit mercenaries in the squad and develop
general skills and spells to deal effectively with the enemy
Advanced system of dialogues, which gives an
opportunity to express their point of view

Interaction with any objects and combining them to create new objects
Turn-based battle system with the ability to implement an elaborate
tactics, using and combining skills, spells, terrain and terrain
features, work together
Multiplayer mode.
Level editor. Two in one: the game and the
opportunity to create your own campaign!
Music for the game was written by Kirill Pokrovsky,
the ex-keyboardist of "Aria" and "Masters"


Repack Features:

Divinity: Original Sin
Version of the game - v1.0.81.0
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to install VMware text from Notabenoid v.1.4

Additions:

The Golden Grail
Zandalor's Trunks
